Interface ComponentConfigurationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurableComponentCollection, FixedFrequencyNeuronCollection, FixedProtocolNeuronCollection, FixedSynapseCollection, Graupner2012SynapseCollection, LinearNeuronCollection, NeuronCollection, NeuronRandom, Pfister2006SynapseCollection, SynapseCollection

    public interface ComponentConfigurationListener
    Interface for classes that are to be notified of changes to a ComponentConfiguration.
    Author:
    Oliver J. Coleman
